quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
author: Walt Disney

quote: Opportunities don't happen. You create them.
author: Chris Grosser

quote: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: The road to success and the road to failure are almost exactly the same.
author: Colin R. Davis

quote: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
author: Sam Levenson

quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
author: Confucius

quote: Difficulties in life are intended to make us better, not bitter.
author: Dan Reeves

quote: Fall seven times and stand up eight.
author: Japanese Proverb

quote: Success is not how high you have climbed, but how you make a positive difference in the world.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: Hardships often prepare ordinary people for an extraordinary destiny.
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: If you really want to do something, you'll find a way. If you don’t, you'll find an excuse.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Don't be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: Doubt kills more dreams than failure ever will.
author: Suzy Kassem

quote: The secret to success is to know something nobody else knows.
author: Aristotle Onassis

quote: In the middle of every difficulty lies opportunity.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: The only impossible journey is the one you never begin.
author: Tony Robbins

quote: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
author: Confucius

quote: Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Happiness is not something ready-made. It comes from your own actions.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: Knowing yourself is the beginning of all wisdom.
author: Aristotle

quote: Do what you feel in your heart to be right, for you’ll be criticized anyway.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Not how long, but how well you have lived is the main thing.
author: Seneca

quote: You cannot swim for new horizons until you have courage to lose sight of the shore.
author: William Faulkner

quote: You do not find the happy life. You make it.
author: Camilla Eyring Kimball

quote: Sometimes the questions are complicated and the answers are simple.
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: Keep your face always toward the sunshine, and shadows will fall behind you.
author: Walt Whitman

quote: Happiness depends upon ourselves.
author: Aristotle

quote: An unexamined life is not worth living.
author: Socrates

quote: Kindness is a language which the deaf can hear and the blind can see.
author: Mark Twain

quote: The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.
author: Audrey Hepburn

quote: No one has ever become poor by giving.
author: Anne Frank

quote: Do small things with great love.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: A loving heart is the truest wisdom.
author: Charles Dickens

quote: Spread love everywhere you go. Let no one ever come to you without leaving happier.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: To love and be loved is to feel the sun from both sides.
author: David Viscott

quote: A single act of kindness throws out roots in all directions.
author: Amelia Earhart

quote: Love all, trust a few, do wrong to none.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Love is not about how much you say 'I love you,' but how much you prove that it’s true.
author: Unknown

quote: He who has a why to live can bear almost any how.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Courage is resistance to fear, mastery of fear—not absence of fear.
author: Mark Twain

quote: We generate fears while we sit. We overcome them by action.
author: Dr. Henry Link

quote: Do what you fear and keep doing it. That’s the quickest way to conquer it.
author: Dale Carnegie

quote: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
author: William James

quote: It is never too late to be what you might have been.
author: George Eliot

quote: You cannot always control what goes on outside. But you can always control what goes on inside.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: Turn your wounds into wisdom.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Life is not about waiting for the storm to pass but about learning to dance in the rain.
author: Vivian Greene

quote: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: A leader is one who knows the way, goes the way, and shows the way.
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: The function of leadership is to produce more leaders, not more followers.
author: Ralph Nader

quote: Do not follow where the path may lead. Go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Leadership is not about being in charge. It is about taking care of those in your charge.
author: Simon Sinek

quote: People buy into the leader before they buy into the vision.
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: The best way to find yourself is to lose yourself in the service of others.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: The greatest leader is not necessarily the one who does the greatest things. He is the one that gets the people to do the greatest things.
author: Ronald Reagan

quote: A genuine leader is not a searcher for consensus but a molder of consensus.
author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quote: Great leaders are willing to sacrifice their own personal interests for the good of the team.
author: John Wooden

quote: To handle yourself, use your head; to handle others, use your heart.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Happiness is not by chance, but by choice.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: Happiness is not having what you want. It is appreciating what you have.
author: Unknown

quote: You will find as you look back upon your life that the moments when you have truly lived are the moments when you have done things in the spirit of love.
author: Henry Drummond

quote: Happiness is not something you postpone for the future; it is something you design for the present.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Happiness is a journey, not a destination.
author: Buddha

quote: Being happy doesn’t mean everything is perfect. It means you’ve decided to look beyond the imperfections.
author: Gerard Way

quote: Some people feel the rain. Others just get wet.
author: Bob Marley

quote: Enjoy the little things in life, for one day you may look back and realize they were the big things.
author: Robert Brault

quote: A smile is happiness you’ll find right under your nose.
author: Tom Wilson

quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: Do what you have to do until you can do what you want to do.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
author: Arthur Ashe

quote: A river cuts through rock not because of its power, but because of its persistence.
author: Jim Watkins

quote: Success is getting what you want. Happiness is wanting what you get.
author: Dale Carnegie

quote: Don't let yesterday take up too much of today.
author: Will Rogers

quote: You just can’t beat the person who never gives up.
author: Babe Ruth

quote: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Believe you can and you’re halfway there.
author: Theodore Roosevelt
